ygData.subject: Re: ** SPOILER **  Help with Human Wiz Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes he is in the East Freeport.  Go out via the gate then go right till you reach the city wall.  Go up approx 100 feet.  They should be 1 or 2 tree near the
ygData.messageBody:
Yes he is in the East Freeport. Go out via the gate then go right till you
reach the city wall. Go up approx 100 feet. They should be 1 or 2 tree
near the city wall. Stay there and you will see him comes around.

----- Original Message -----
From: Donald Taber <dtaber@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, April 22, 1999 9:59 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: ** SPOILER ** Help with Human Wiz Quests


> From: Donald Taber <dtaber@...>
>
> Thanks for the info on Lydl. I assume he is in the East Freeport zone and
not
>
> North Ro?
>
> I haven't found the locked box. I made the same mistake thinking you
could
> swim to the island, but after re-reading the info you are given, I believe
you
> have
> to take the boat out. I have taken the boat out to the first island stop,
> searched
> and found nothing. I also made it to the second stop, searched and found
> nothing.
> I had to stop playing at this point, but I understand there is one more
island
> stop
> (it was my first trip on the boat). Let me know if you find it or get any
> more
> information.
>
> On the bright side, my swimming skill is pretty high now!
>
>
Thanks
> again,
>
>
> Soren
>
> Billy Sun wrote:
>
> > From: "Billy Sun" <bsun@...>
> >
> > Lydl Mastat is near the East Freeport. He walks around between 1pm to
7pm
> > game time. In regard to the second quest, where did you find the locked
> > box? I swam across but find nothing.
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: Donald Taber <dtaber@...>

> >
> > > From: Donald Taber <dtaber@...>
> > >
> > > I have found 2 different quests which I am having problems with.
> > >
> > > 1. Find Lydl Mastat outside of Freeport and get the locked book from
> > > him.
> > > I have tried to find him out both gates, in North Ro, and in East
> > > Commanlands
> > > and can't find him. Where is he? Does he only appear at certain
> > > times? I
> > > have looked MANY times and can't find him.
> > >
> > > 2. Get the locked strongbox back. I have found that the box is on an
> > > island
> > > which is straight out from the docks. Is it possible to swim there or
> > > do I need
> > > a boat?
> > >
> > >
> > > Thanks,
> > >
> > >
> > > Soren
